data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: It is important to define the goals and outputs of the rules mining activity. This ____ vary ____ on ____ business ____ of ____. For ____, ____ goal ____ be ____ address ____ or ____ downtime ____ a ____ valuable ____ customized ____. This may lead to the decision to move to a SOA-enabled packaged application.
data.partBlankContent: It is important to define the goals and outputs of the rules mining activity. This wi__ vary depe_____ on t__ business prior_____ of organi_______. For so__, t__ goal m__ be t_ address inflex_______ or hi__ downtime i_ a hig___ valuable a__ customized appli______. This may lead to the decision to move to a SOA-enabled packaged application.
data.answer: 定义规则挖掘活动的目标和输出非常重要。这取决于组织的业务优先级。对于某些应用程序，目标可能是解决高价值和定制应用程序中的不灵活性或高停机时间。这可能导致决定迁移到支持soa的打包应用程序。
